name: Descent (jpbash)
description:
A short isometic sci-fi horror game.

You have been drafted to investigate the disappearance of the crew of the research vessel VALIS XI. Explore the abandoned spacecraft to uncover the mystery of their fate, and the discovery that led to their demise.

Controls:

Use [arrow] keys or [WASD] to move.

Fullscreen encouranged, and turn off your lights!

PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: Some mild flashing lights

Made in <1 week for Curdle Jam #20 - Descent Into Madness.

Credits:

Programming, story and music by jpbash.

Assets:

Smallest Pixel by Style-7

Stylized Astronaut by Pulsar Bytes

Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack by karboosx

Insectoid Crab Monster by LB3D
